name: Dar
description:
this is the prototype for a game called Dar don't expect a lot of this prototype its overly simple Just want to see some thought on the game . the game idea was inspired from Neighbours from hell games the gameplay in this is really simple ton of ideas were not applied in this prototype as I said its a simple prototype   

an explain for the control since the prototype is pretty bad at it 

E to skip dialogue 

F to open doors and pretty much every thing else 

at Day 1 to control robot you could use space to fly 

e to open the flash
